title: "AI is more data-hungry than ever, and DefinedCrowd raises $50M B round to feed it"
excerpt: "As AI has grown from niche to mission-critical technology, the companies that enable it have multiplied and in many cases prospered. A good example of that success is DefinedCrowd, which has gone from the Disrupt stage to globe-spanning AI toolkit to the Fortune 500 in just a couple years."
